channel.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
channel.description:
I pmed the un-named asking for approval, he said yes, but he said it in msn so ill ask him to post saying confirmed :)
Well, i decided to go away from forums and make a homepage material site. And so far so good. The site is http://www.moparftw.bravehost.com/ When it gets more active and stuff ill consider buying a domain. Feel free to pm me and ill add your site to the list.
Just hope you guys will check it out ;)

item.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Frell:

Thats CC?

The crime called for the punishment. Saying this with all respect possible, what did you expect? You posted a site with links. Would you like something like this?

Wow I love that site, THANK YOU TEMPLATE WORLD! And Frell, seriously thanks for your adding a bit of text. I really appreciate your hard work. It really turns me on when a guy knows how to hyperlink.

Read full topic

@MastrChief wrote:

Stop the flaming…

item.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:43, topic:129611”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=180224.msg1648868#msg1648868 date=1186129950]

im buying a domain soon. I like the template, its ok.

frellthejavacoder@hotmail.com
^^ Blatant lies.

I made that when i started p servers Pretty old. But i hate switching. Its anyoying

The point is that your site is just a template with you inserting links. No coding done. So why should I be impressed that you can use a template? It’s actually a waste of time and wrong to call it your website when all you are doing is using someone else’s template and saying 'OH LOOK I REGISTERED A DOMAIN AND HERE’S MY WEBSITE WITH SOMEONE ELSE’S WORK AND ALL I DID WAS PUT IN A FEW WORDS". It’s just sad.

Thats CC?

Yes. Don’t get all butthurt that someone didn’t like your “site”.
[/quote]
um i dont give a peice of crap if someone dosent like my site. so you can sthu and go to fricken fag heaven for all i care[/quote]
You’re retarded and need to get a brain and some common sense to realize that the post you quoted wasn’t towards you.

Read full topic

item.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Frell:

Well, i decided to go away from forums and make a homepage material site. And so far so good.

Since you didn’t make the template, please rephrase your sentence.

Adding links to someone else’s template you’re hosting isn’t making a page, unless you make a lot of noticeable changes other than text.

Read full topic

item.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:42, topic:129611”][quote author=Frell link=topic=180224.msg1648861#msg1648861 date=1186129885]

im buying a domain soon. I like the template, its ok.

frellthejavacoder@hotmail.com
^^ Blatant lies.

I made that when i started p servers Pretty old. But i hate switching. Its anyoying

The point is that your site is just a template with you inserting links. No coding done. So why should I be impressed that you can use a template? It’s actually a waste of time and wrong to call it your website when all you are doing is using someone else’s template and saying 'OH LOOK I REGISTERED A DOMAIN AND HERE’S MY WEBSITE WITH SOMEONE ELSE’S WORK AND ALL I DID WAS PUT IN A FEW WORDS". It’s just sad.

Thats CC?
[/quote]
Yes. Don’t get all butthurt that someone didn’t like your “site”.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 09:32:30 PM[/size][hr][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=180224.msg1648865#msg1648865 date=1186129926]

omg leave frell alone, dude i just wanted to point out it wasnt made by him, so now can you guys stfu and stop flaming him, thuglife, im not TELLING YOU this because your nice, but daycrawler, back off

Dude. Honestly. Be quiet. All I did was post constructive criticism making an actual useful post unlike the spam that you constantly post that only kisses ass.

why dont you go bitch some one else faggot
[/quote]
Why don’t you go use a dictionary so that we can actually have an intelligent conversation instead of these petty insults that you use in order to try to “hurt” my self-esteem. Go back to moparscape please where these insults and horrible grammar are accepted as part of the English language.[/quote]
Im not. I wasnt trying to ‘impress’ i was trying to be helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: My site (Not Forums) - Great Homepage!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

xxlegitxx:

I understand where you’re going, Frell, because I used to do it too. When you showcase a site, you want to be able to say you made it yourself. And templates with a bit of changed links doesn’t really cut it. Learn XHTML with divs and CSS, if you need any assistance, I’d be glad to help you out. I’m working on AJAX right now at work, so I’ll be on AIM from 8AM through 430PM, and AIM/MSN/YIM from 6PM through 9PM.

If i was going to show off one i made and get rated on it i would post it in web design.

[quote=“daycrawler, post:23, topic:129611”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=180224.msg1648541#msg1648541 date=1186122681]
Making a site praising mopar is pretty homosexual.
[/quote]
No. The wallet picture of mopar that he keeps in his wallet is homosexual.[/quote]
lol?

Read full topic
